head.title: Home - Gila Bend Unified School District #24

input.name: __VIEWSTATE

a.title: Go to Gila Bend Unified School District #24

div.div: Empowering the future, one student at a time.

div.style: position: absolute; left: 0px; top: 0px; z-index: 100001; background-color: rgb(170, 170, 170); opacity: 0.5; display: none;

div.h2: Welcome to the Gila Bend Unified School District

div.div: Gila Bend Unified School District No 24 is located in Central Arizona amidst the beautiful lands of Maricopa County. Gila Bend Unified School District No. 24 was founded in February 1887. The School District is named after the town of Gila Bend which is located on and named for the bend in the Gila River. The current Gila Bend School building was built in May of 1925 and took on its first student in September of 1925. Today Gila Bend Unified School District continues to serve over 450 students grades K-12.

p.style: text-align: center; color: rgb(0, 0, 0); font-family: Calibri, Helvetica, sans-serif, EmojiFont, "Apple Color Emoji", "Segoe UI Emoji", NotoColorEmoji, "Segoe UI Symbol", "Android Emoji", EmojiSymbols; margin-top: 0px; margin-bottom: 0px;

div.style: font-family: Calibri, Arial, Helvetica, sans-serif; margin: 0px; color: black; font-size: 12pt;

p.style: margin: 0px 0px 6px; font-family: Helvetica, Arial, sans-serif; color: rgb(29, 33, 41); font-size: 14px;
margin: 6px 0px; font-family: Helvetica, Arial, sans-serif; color: rgb(29, 33, 41); font-size: 14px;
margin: 6px 0px; font-family: Helvetica, Arial, sans-serif; color: rgb(29, 33, 41); font-size: 14px;

div.p: The GBUSD teachers are asking for your help. We need to be able to contact all students to ensure they receive every opportunity to demonstrate academic skills with their learning packets, remediation, or credit recovery. You can help us in these ways:

p.style: margin: 6px 0px; font-family: Helvetica, Arial, sans-serif; color: rgb(29, 33, 41); font-size: 14px;

div.p:
1. Please be sure we have current contact information for you and/or your child. This is to ensure open communication.
2. New learning packets will be available every two weeks in the Library lobby. Teachers are available via school email (listed below) from 7AM to 5PM on Tuesdays through Fridays. If you can access the necessary technology, teachers and students can speak in real time on Zoom, Microsoft Meetings, FaceTime, Skype, or similar platforms.

p.style: margin: 6px 0px; font-family: Helvetica, Arial, sans-serif; color: rgb(29, 33, 41); font-size: 14px;

div.p: 3. The third quarter report cards will not be sent home as noted on our current school calendar. We will send home a final report card during the week of May 18th. Students that have passed all three quarters will be promoted or graduate. These students can continue to sharpen their academic skills by completing the learning packets bi-weekly. There is no need to return the packets. Students that have not passed all three quarters will not be promoted or graduated unless they complete with proficiency our remediation and/or credit recovery opportunities. Students/parents in this position will be contacted immediately by their teachers to start this process.

p.style: margin: 6px 0px; font-family: Helvetica, Arial, sans-serif; color: rgb(29, 33, 41); font-size: 14px;

div.p: 4. Promotions and graduation ceremonies will occur when the social distancing restrictions are lifted. Stay tuned.

p.style: margin: 6px 0px; font-family: Helvetica, Arial, sans-serif; color: rgb(29, 33, 41); font-size: 14px;

div.p: On a side note, we have fallen behind in our construction schedule to complete the new buildings by July due to the pandemic and recent rains. This means we will start the new school year (2020-2021) in our existing buildings. Please do not let this bother you. When our new Monster Den is ready, we will move in.

p.style: margin: 6px 0px; font-family: Helvetica, Arial, sans-serif; color: rgb(29, 33, 41); font-size: 14px;

div.p: Let’s continue to stay calm and student-focused as we go through this transformation.

p.style: margin: 6px 0px; font-family: Helvetica, Arial, sans-serif; color: rgb(29, 33, 41); font-size: 14px;

div.p: Don’t forget, teacher emails are listed below. Be safe.

p.style: margin: 6px 0px; font-family: Helvetica, Arial, sans-serif; color: rgb(29, 33, 41); text-align: left;
margin: 6px 0px 0px 40px; display: inline; font-family: Helvetica, Arial, sans-serif; color: rgb(29, 33, 41); text-align: left;
